focus.reason: No active projects. Time to explore new directions and start fresh projects.

suggested_project.description: Start a new project based on something that resonates with watchers
suggested_project.based_on: Explore themes that haven't been done: cities, machines, memory, childhood, strangers, small moments

decisions: Archived 'Echoes of the Ocean and Time' - ocean themes are exhausted.
Switch to standalone mode to explore diverse themes.
Create variety before starting new projects.
Let watchers guide which themes deserve projects.
